column4: My sdcard reader will only mount cards as read only. I don't know what to do, even sudo won't work
Have you tried remounting manually using -o remount,rw?
what is the command to do that ?
how do I found out the device ?
mount -l should give you a list of mounted devices, insert the SD card and run it and then pastebin the output for me please
Do this: sudo mkdir /media/ds && sudo mount -t vfat -o remount,defaults /dev/mmcblk0p1 /media/ds
mount: /media/ds not mounted already, or bad option
Oh, sorry. Do this this:   sudo umount /media/NintendoDS && mount -t vfat -o defaults /dev/mmcblk0p1 /media/ds
mount: only root can do that
Oops again, I'm doing so bad. put sudo before mount on that last line I gave you

mount: block device /dev/mmcblk0p1 is write-protected, mounting read-only
2011-09-02T07:59:00.000Z	Polah	rawfodog_	sudo mount -t vfat -o remount,defaults,force /dev/mmcblk0p1 /media/ds
2011-09-02T08:00:00.000Z	rawfodog_	Polah	my screen just went black and all the bash text appeared
